title: Lunchbox Begins His Diamond Excursion in Arkansas + Show Member Reveals Breaking News! + The Hotel Drama with Lunchbox vs. Scuba Steve
itunes:title: Lunchbox Begins His Diamond Excursion in Arkansas + Show Member Reveals Breaking News! + The Hotel Drama with Lunchbox vs. Scuba Steve
description:
We talk to Lunchbox as he begins mining for diamonds in Murfreesboro, Arkansas. What’s his approach to finding his million-dollar diamond??Someone on the show reveals some breaking news! Something almost 2 years in the making! We also hear about the hotel room that Lunchbox stayed in last night and why he is upset at Scuba Steve.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
